text:
Oracle Cloud Infrastructure | Seattle, WA | Full-Time, Onsite | Java, Distributed Systems, Control Planes | https://cloud.oracle.com/cloud-infrastructure

I'm looking for senior developers to help build out the compute imaging service. This is a small team where you'll have high autonomy and impact.

-- Senior Software Development Engineer: https://oracle.taleo.net/careersection/2/jobdetail.ftl?job=1...

-- Principal Software Development Engineer: https://oracle.taleo.net/careersection/2/jobdetail.ftl?job=1...

Resumes / questions to: bri.chang@oracle.com
